page.title: 02THE BLACKO DOMESDAY BOX
page.content: In 1985 an old toilet block at the rear of{BLACKO SCHOOL}was demolished. A low exterior wall was retained and the area filled with soil so that a garden could be created. It was decided to make this into a{DOMESDAY {GARDEN}and, at the time of writing this description, plans are still being made. A large stainless steel chest has been made and children at school have begun to collect items which will tell a future generation all about life in{BLACKO}in{1985.}This chest will be buried in the garden and its position indicated by a brass plaque fixed on the wall adjoining Beverley Road.The box will hold completed{PROJECT MATERIAL}based on the Domesday Block,{VIDEO RECORDING}of Christmas Concert 1984,{TAPE RECORDING of old resident's memories,{ARTEFACTS, {PHOTOGRAPHS}etc.{OPEN IN YEAR 2085....
